DOC.brief_summary: In pancreatic cancer , target tumor microenvironment become promising therapeutic strategy . Focal adhesion kinase ( FAK ) pathway activation essential promote fibrotic inflammatory tumor microenvironment , FAK inhibitor demonstrate reasonable anti-tumor activity preclinical setting . Furthermore , maximal synergetic effect achieve FAK inhibitor give combination PD-1 antagonist chemotherapy multiple pancreas tumor animal model . This support concept use FAK inhibitor reduce stromal fibrosis checkpoint immunotherapeutic treatment . Therefore , robust preclinical finding test proposed phase I trial .
